name: Nimble Bunn
description:
Greetings! My name is Bunn. Welcome to my strange and beautiful world. You might find it silly that I'm constantly searching for food but it's the main thing I need to keep fit. Running, jumping and overcoming challenges isn't so easy. My tiny world is full of platforms and portals. Don't think that I'm a coward as most rabbits are! I'm brave enough to pass all the levels and reach my goal.
As I like to say: "With a fluffy nibble Bunn you'll have a lot of fun " :)

▪ Variety of locations
▪ Different traps
▪ Bargain price
▪ Steam achievements

Controls:
▪ Move - [ left and right arrows or A and D ] on keyboard
▪ Jump - [ arrow up or W ] on keyboard
▪ High Jump - [ arrow down, S or Space ] on keyboard
▪ Restart - R on keyboard

Coming soon:
▪ Steam trading cards
